chunks.zh: 有没有治愈电影或者电视推荐
chunks.en: Any healing movie or TV recommendations?

chunks.zh: 人生遭遇大挫败，缓不过劲来了，需要一点绝望缝隙的光。
chunks.en: Life has encountered a major setback, and I can't recover. I need a little light in the cracks of despair.

chunks.zh: 稍微知名一点的我都看过了，希望来点冷门佳片。
chunks.en: I've seen the slightly well-known ones. I hope for some lesser-known masterpieces.

chunks.zh: ipx-726
chunks.en: ipx-726

chunks.zh: 当幸福来敲门
chunks.en: The Pursuit of Happyness

chunks.zh: 请回答 1988
chunks.en: Reply 1988

chunks.zh: 台剧《有生之年》 ，去看看。吴慷仁主演。“有生之年，活到这么大，已经很不容易了…”
chunks.en: Taiwanese drama 'One Day', go watch it. Starring Wu Kang-ren. 'In my lifetime, living to be so old, it's already not easy...'

chunks.zh: 完美的日子
chunks.en: Perfect Days

chunks.zh: 台剧 有生之年
chunks.en: Taiwanese drama One Day

chunks.zh: 海蒂和爷爷
chunks.en: Heidi

chunks.zh: 海边的曼彻斯特
chunks.en: Manchester by the Sea

chunks.zh: 我推荐《士兵突击》，百看不厌
chunks.en: I recommend 'Soldiers Sortie', you'll never get tired of watching it.

chunks.zh: 《白日梦想家》
chunks.en: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty

chunks.zh: @katwalk 里面的不少主题曲或背景音乐也很不错。
chunks.en: @katwalk Many of the theme songs or background music inside are also very good.

chunks.zh: 《我左眼看到鬼》我以我的声誉担保，大家看完记得来给我点赞！适合情侣一起看，超。。。超。。。超。。。好看。
chunks.en: 'My Left Eye Sees Ghosts' I guarantee it with my reputation, remember to give me a like after watching it! Suitable for couples to watch together, super...super...super...good-looking.

chunks.zh: 《海边的曼切斯特》很治（致）愈（郁）
chunks.en: 'Manchester by the Sea' is very healing (depressing).

chunks.zh: @bojackhorseman 《如父如子》也挺推荐的，去年在国内院线上映，十年前的老电影了，拍得很细腻。
chunks.en: @bojackhorseman 'Like Father, Like Son' is also highly recommended. It was released in domestic theaters last year, it's an old movie from ten years ago, filmed very delicately.

chunks.zh: 《哪啊哪啊神去村》
chunks.en: Wood Job! (The Woodsman and the Rain)

chunks.zh: 没看到后一句，当我没说
chunks.en: Didn't see the last sentence, never mind.

chunks.zh: 横道世之介，时空恋旅人。
chunks.en: A Story of Yonosuke, About Time.

chunks.zh: 《一个叫欧维的男人决定去死》
chunks.en: A Man Called Ove

chunks.zh: 心灵捕手   刚看完
chunks.en: Good Will Hunting Just finished watching

chunks.zh: <<寂静人生>>
chunks.en: Still Life
